attributes.action: make it a legal requirement to clearly display shop or house number
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with the increase in property refurbishment, it seems that the need to display the road number does not seem important anymore. therefore i would like it to become a legal requirement that all shops and businesses must display clearly their number.the need to see the number visibly is important as vehicles tend to slow down suddenly trying to see these numbers which are not there let alone visible and i am sure that this could cause an accident if it has not done so already.
